General.CalloutAdvisory: ~o~Intercept the meeting as a special force sniper~s~

D_Briefing.Dialogue: This briefing is intended to give you an overview of what's going on.
We have reports of a illegal drug handover taking place today at the Sandy Shores Airfield.
Since you're one of the best trained sniper elites, your job is to scout and call us once a drug deal is made.
We will then come in hot with 2 unmarked units and 1 swat bearcat. If we're taking fire, your job is to take them out.
We have spotted a good sniper position for you on one of the buildings next to the airfield.
But for now, first choose a sniper, for that in the police station right there on the table.

Meeting.Text: Get yourself a sniper in the police station.

Weapon.Text: Now drive to the scene and prepare.

DriveToScene.Text: This is the reported ~o~drug handover meeting point~s~. You'll now see on the minimap where ~g~your sniper position~s~ will be, go on the roof there.

Scenarios.Text: Once the ~g~handover~s~ is done, go in and arrest the ~r~suspects!
The suspects are ~r~fleeing~s~, we are pursuing!
You can pick up the ~g~case~s~ with {0}.
